short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to quickly shorten any link or the current page's URL using once.to.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a companion Chrome extension for once.to, world's fastest link shortener.

It adds a new item in the page context menu (the one that is opened on a right click), which allows you to quickly shorten the chosen link — and get a short version instead, for sharing on social networks, messengers, or to obtain as a QR code.

Please note that you have to be signed in on once.to in order for this feature to work. You can easily create an account at https://once.to/signup — it's totally free!

With this free account you can track your link performance, measure clicks, analyse your audience, create geo-targeting rules and much more.
